**Wikipedia summary**:  
<p class="mw-empty-elt">
</p>

<p>The <b>coho salmon</b> (<i><b>Oncorhynchus kisutch</b>;</i> Karuk: achvuun) is a species of anadromous fish in the salmon family and one of the five Pacific salmon species. Coho salmon are also known as <b>silver salmon</b> (or "silvers") and is often sold as <b>medium red salmon</b>. The scientific species name is based on the Russian common name <i>kizhuch</i> (кижуч).
